title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 354.3 - Restoration to membership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 354.3 - Restoration to membership

State Regulations

Any such individual shall be re-enrolled as a member of the

Retirement System (unless he or she is re-employed under the provisions of
section
210
or
211
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law) and the retirement allowance shall be suspended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
354.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
